Rohese
Saturday, August 12th, 2017, 11:10:50 AM

Dressed in "Sugar and Spice" for the Fashion Week 5117 launch party tonight at 6pm.

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim the Patron of the Displaced.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair tucked into a loose chignon adorned with a fluted citrus yellow calla lily with saffron and gold striations. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has muted golden pink gloss brushed onto her slim fingernails.

She has a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline, and an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing a pair of dark gold drop earrings, a loosely draped dark gold chiffon stole, a pair of elbow-length salmon pink suede gloves, a platinum wedding ring, a structured off-shoulder gown of palest pink faille split over glossy saffron taffeta, and some vibrant saffron sandals perched on narrow gold spikes.

Rohese has sweet tendrils of chamomile encircling her, the warm, honeyed fragrance tamed by tart notes of lemongrass and the faintest caress of lush briar roses. Beneath it all, base notes of dark vanilla unite the fragrance as a whole.

Maylan
Saturday, August 12th, 2017, 11:24:51 AM

You see Maylan the Master Healer.

She appears to be an Aelotoi of the Mrae'ni Clan.

She is of a slight height and has a thin, wiry frame. She appears to be in the spring of life. She has completely solid, vivid jade eyes and mocha-freckled, lightly tanned skin. She has unevenly cut, tangled raven-sheened hair that haphazardly falls about her face and is barely contained by a stiff leather tricorne. She has a narrow face, a gently sloped nose and a pointed chin. She has a small gap between her front teeth. She has a discolored mop-fringed pegleg for a leg. She has a pair of curvy, dark-veined pearly wings rippled with peacock patterns.

She has a tiny flawless diamond stud in her right nostril, and a drunk puppy tattoo with a lolling tongue on her leg.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing a pair of peacock feather earrings, a slender leather choker clasped by a jade teardrop, a dingy tin wedding band, a pieced leather pack, a glossy cordovan leather bandolier over a scarlet silk saephua splattered in crusted green muck stains, a spiraled ouroburos rainbow glaes armband, a rune-carved drinking horn suspended from a thin strap, a soft suede herb kit stamped with a blooming sovyn, and some ebon silk pantaloons speckled with fuzzy red mold.

look pegleg Cracked and discolored, the faded blonde wooden pegleg bears a suspicious resemblance to the hacked-off business end of a ratty old mop. A thick, tangled fringe of sodden, grey-brown cotton splays out from its splintered tip like a dejected anemone and leaves a smear of filth wherever it goes.

Destrier
Saturday, August 12th, 2017, 4:31:14 PM

You see Blade Aurach the Night Druid of Isil Dae'gonn. He appears to be a Faendryl Dark Elf. He is average height. He appears to be ancient. He has thick-lashed stormy grey eyes and black skin. He has shoulder length, flowing mithril-hued hair finger-combed into a naturally tousled style. He has a small deep green spider on his neck. He has a crescent moon tattoo on his neck.

You are wearing an an elven-wrought eonake circlet skeletally caged with illthorn branches, a brushed obsidian wool cloak caught at the shoulder with a triskele of scarlet despanal, a storm grey Faendryl-style tabard over some Ithziri eahnor chain armor with a black leather arming doublet underneath, a bone and illthorn phylactery, a small eonake star, a miniature crossed silver swords pin, a weathered leather herb sack with a thick shoulder strap slung over your shoulder, an embroidered grey spidersilk satchel slung over your other shoulder, a seasoned dusky leather pack, a veil iron mesh surcoat, a lor triskele inset with three ebon-veined scarlet despanals, some archaic elven-crafted vambraces forged in a faenor-gilt lor leaf pattern, some dusky leather gloves knuckled in wrought iron leaves, an ancient Faendryl band, a bronze Faendryl signet ring, a thick leather sword belt with overlapping dull iron leaves, a vine-engraved verdant faenor scabbard, a veniom-worked black silk gem pouch, an ancient faenor key hung from a silver chain, some pleated black linen trousers with green and grey striations, some archaic elven-crafted greaves forged in a faenor-gilt lor bark pattern, and some scuffed hunter green knee-high boots.

A few items that display our GM's efforts.

look armor The timeworn suit of armor is comprised of a multitude of delicate six in one interwoven links, subtly tinted in autumnal hues ranging from faded eahnor red, through burnt umber and traced with limned moss green. The impossibly intricate woven assemblage creates a lor leaf patterned shifting mosaic that wisp's silver vapor with each movement and the entire suit is layered over faded green leather. You see nothing unusual, except for a small enchanter's glyph. A strange necrotic haze radiates from the armor.

Look tabard The faendryl-style scout's tabard has a stiff, short collar designed to curve comfortably around the wearer's neck. Veniom thread, embroidered on the back panels, depicts the crest of House Moonshadew. Embroidered on a front panel is a small gold and crimson phoenix.

l band The band's engraving indicates it was cast for veterans of the Third Elven War. Running along the inside of the band, a name is engraved in precise, angular script. There appears to be something written on it.

l star Engraved on the star are the words "To Honor and to Serve"

l surcoat Rare veil iron has been painstakingly crafted into an intricate mesh, retaining the strength of the metal while allowing for a flexible garment. Despite the metal, the surcoat retains the appearance of elegant outerwear, boasting intricately crafted folds designed to cover any armor. A sleek cowl completes the garment, with subtle color variations linked into the mesh to give a hint of flair to the piece.

l pack This pack is made of sturdy leather but has seen much use. Several claw marks can be seen on the back of the pack, but have been roughly repaired with various pieces of thin twine. A single clasp, made from a small rolaren leaf secures this sturdy pack shut. Along the side of the dusky leather pack are a series of narrow scabbards, several which are rhimar-throated, as well as a small number of loops.

l band Etched on the wide bronze band, within the oval face of the signet, is an ancient fallen grey tower, some of the structure crumbled beyond repair. Twin budding lor trees flank the rubble, the limbs sprayed outward through the ruins, the appendages etched with the words, "Moon Whisper" as they arc upwards towards the top most edges of the ring face. The silver-toned tree limbs flank the remaining structure of the tower, reinforcing the sides and doorway with thickly braided designs. There appears to be something written on it.

Hips
Sunday, August 13th, 2017, 12:54:28 AM

I couldn't find a second pallid sapphire to go in her fascinator before the event tonight in Ta'Illistim. :(

The gown design isn't mine, I think it was Xayle's.

You see Grand Lady Issalya Valdarien Illistim the Walker of Lore.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is petite and has a slim body. She appears to have come of age. She has large, owlish gentian blue eyes and pale as parchment skin. She has long, lustrous silver hair smoothly swept into an elegant chignon at the nape of her neck and pinned beneath a fragile net and silk fascinator gathered around a single ruffled gardenia. She has a heart-shaped face and a pair of half-lensed spectacles perched upon her small nose. Her small, yet distinctively sloping nose is perfectly offset by the bowed curve of her upper lip, while her slender neck and delicate bone structure enhance her fragile appearance. She has satin-finished dark sapphire lacquer brushed onto her subtly rounded fingernails.

She has a pair of white-feathered wings protruding from her back.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing a delicate silver choker suspending pallid sapphire drops of varied sizes, a fluffy pale grey rabbit fur stole, a metallic-sheened argent satin gown with embroidered mithglin accents on the corseted bodice, a slender silver signet, and some pointy-toed argent satin slippers.

Rohese
Sunday, August 13th, 2017, 6:08:56 AM

"Shabby Chic" for the first full day of Fashion Week.

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair pushed back behind her ears, and tucked with a gold-nibbed cream owl feather on one side. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has coppery sepia lacquer brushed onto her short, rounded fingernails.

She has a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline, and an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck.

She is in good shape.

She is holding a lacquered case sculpted from layers of parchment in her left hand.

She is wearing a pebble-fixed tatted lace choker, a platinum wedding ring, a shredded cornsilk chiffon gown bound by a longline corset of torn leather bookspines, and a pair of dark distressed leather high shoes trimmed with pale lace.

Choker ~ Oyster silk ribbons unite the ends of a length of pale grey needle-tatted lace to form a charming and understated choker. Tumbled until flat and smooth, an oval pebble of pallid rainbow sandstone is fixed to the center of the piece, perfectly sized so as to rest comfortably in the hollow of the wearer's throat.

Rohese has a wild melange of floral scents floating about her. The untameable scent of heather is accented by larkspur and breaths of fairy primrose.

Sunday, August 13th, 2017, 10:00:05 PM

Another Ta'Illistim event, another outfit.

You see Grand Lady Issalya Valdarien Illistim the Walker of Lore.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is petite and has a slim body. She appears to have come of age. She has large, owlish gentian blue eyes and pale as parchment skin. She has long, lustrous silver hair pinned back on one side with a rosy-centered pale alabaster moonflower. She has a heart-shaped face and a small nose. Her small, yet distinctively sloping nose is perfectly offset by the bowed curve of her upper lip, while her slender neck and delicate bone structure enhance her fragile appearance. A diminutive teardrop of ultramarine glimaerstone is positioned between her eyes, which casts a sparkling mercurial sheen across her face.

She has a pair of white-feathered wings protruding from her back and wrapped protectively around her.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing a delicate silver choker suspending ultramarine glimaerstone drops of varied sizes, a sumptuous white fox fur stole, a square-necked pale silk satin cotehardie woven with faint veniom blue tendrils, a slender silver signet, and some ruched-toe pale blue suede slippers.

You have the pure essence of seaside mist haloing you in a sheer, airy fragrance. Soft magnolia accords are captured within the white moonflower heart notes, adding a subtly floral afterglow to the scent.

Nilandia
Sunday, August 13th, 2017, 11:59:09 PM

Also attending the inquest in Ta'Illistim tonight. Good thing I have stuff in storage, since I haven't really had a chance to put things together since getting back.

You see Nilandia Liserna the Master Telepath.

She appears to be a Sylvankind.

She is tall in stature. She appears to be youthful. She has keen willow green eyes and silken alabaster skin. She has rich, copper-infused henna red hair styled into a complex arrangement of looping and draping plaits, woven through with some vivid scarlet flowering maple curving into bell-shaped blossoms. She has a serene and delicate face and slightly upswept ears arcing to fine points. The planes of her cheeks and the swell of her lips echo the curvilinear forms of gently unfurling new leaves. A teardrop viridescent glimaerstone incised with a seven-pointed gilt star is positioned between her eyes, which casts a sparkling gold sheen across her face.

She has an inked spiral of bronze tendrils tightly coiled upon each temple, a rose-twined ebony key tattoo on her neck, and a marking of three vertical mist grey lines upon the inner wrist.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing an orb-inset haon talisman, a sheer silk mantle veined to resemble a fragile haon leaf, a warm cinnamon chainsil bliaut twice-wrapped with a girdle of bronze peacock feathers, a polished red maple signet, and some pointed copper linen slippers heeled in rich maoral.

You have top notes of creamy meadowsweet latticed with lemon mint aromatics scenting your skin. A faint, earthy musk imparted by red trillium rounds out the damask rose undertones.

You see Lady Luxelle Machtes the Muse. She appears to be an Elf. She is average height. She appears to be youthful. She has emerald-sparked lagoon blue eyes and creamy fair skin. She has long and pale, sun-kissed flaxen hair which falls in a curtain of silky waves past her waist. She has slightly upswept pointed ears. Her features bear a soft, gentle appearance. She has a stuffed silver-dusted nightingale perched on her shoulder.

She is holding a nightingale-topped glowbark harp in her left hand.

She is wearing a woven silver eahnor ferronniere dangling a crescent moon, a twisted mesille hairstick, a poof-sleeved raw silk pelisse, a cap-sleeved soft orchid gown with flowing floral chiffon skirting, a musician's valise with a stylized silver eahnor nightingale slung over her shoulder, a matte black kelyn sword symbol edged in silver, a silver eahnor wedding ring, and some sparkling crystal-heeled slippers.

Monday, August 14th, 2017, 6:27:54 AM

Day 3 of Fashion Week: Metallic Mastery!

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair bound tightly into a high chignon and secured with a burnished circlet of alternating gold and bronze bands, leaving two loose curls to drape over one shoulder. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has a lucent vivid bronze tint brushed onto her oval-shaped fingernails.

She has an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck, and a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing an open-gold filigree gorget terminating in winged pauldrons, a platinum wedding ring, a slender fitting gown of fine-grained dark leather sewn with burnished gold wire, and a pair of arched dark bronze silk chopines.

Rohese has wisps of ylang ylang and tangerine, the first recognizable infusions in the fragrance, that dance lightly on her skin. The bright florals and citrus fade away against the night-dark velvet base of vetiver and clove, each brought low and made more subtle by the poignancy of wild rose.

Tuesday, August 15th, 2017, 7:15:30 AM

Dressed in "Woodland Walks" today.

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair falling in a sleek curtain behind a crown of spiny modwir branches scattered with silvery green aventurine-carved leaves that sits high on the back of her head. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has alternating grey and pewter lacquer brushed onto her sleek fingernails.

She has an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck, and a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline.

She is in good shape.

She is holding a compact mistwood case inlaid with a forest scene mosaic in her right hand.

She is wearing a flat stone pendant imprinted with small fern leaf, a platinum wedding ring, a low-shouldered woodland green samite gown with satin-glossed sleeves, and some heelless suede-on-rowan shoes.

Shoes ~ Buttery soft suede, silvery grey in hue, has been stretched tightly across the high vamp of these backless shoes to ensure a tight but comfortable fit. The subtle blend of colors displayed by the napped finish gives the leather an almost metallic quality which is accentuated by the tiny steel rivets along the welt. Precariously balanced on a contoured rowan wood platform beneath just the ball of the foot, the sole arcs gracefully upward and leaves the heel completely exposed and unsupported.

Rohese has a well-meshed collection of woodland scents haunting the air about her -- detectable are fresh pine sap, oak, dew-damp moss, and patchouli.

Rohese
Wednesday, August 16th, 2017, 7:26:11 AM

Back to the "Shabby Chic" and probably my favourite so far.

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair caught in a casual roll at the nape of her neck by some angular witchwood hairsticks. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has lustrous ivory-tipped polish brushed onto her squared fingernails.

She has an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck, and a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing a slender leather collar adorned with a trio of ivory anemones, a distressed leather shrug caught with a fall of chains, a platinum wedding ring, an off-shoulder natural silk gown with layered silk underskirts, and a pair of dark distressed leather high shoes trimmed with pale lace.

The gown is a fully unlocked Farusteri and I've added Joola's petticoats (invisibly) for added deliciousness:

Taking hold of the wide skirts of her natural silk gown with one hand, Rohese sashays about gracefully, the skirts swinging to and fro in time with her steps.

Rohese gathers the wide skirts of her natural silk gown in her hands and drops into a low curtsy while maintaining impeccable posture and grace.

Rohese folds her arms in front of herself, clasping her hands.

Rohese rubs her leather collar, causing it to release a powdery scent of anemones into the air.

Rohese
Thursday, August 17th, 2017, 6:49:50 AM

Running out of steam but managed to put another outfit together. "Woodland Walks" again:

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair parted to the side and pinned back with a cluster of darkened merlot garnet berries set in an ornament of wrought gold leaves. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has a garnet-suffused deep wine color brushed onto her flawlessly shaped fingernails. She has a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline, and an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck.

She is in good shape.

She is holding a burnished copper-panelled cylinder in her right hand.

She is wearing a platinum wedding ring, an autumnal foil-on-leather bodice over a strapless sheath gown of burnt copper charmeuse with a pooling side train, and a pair of claret burnt velvet high chopines.

Cylinder ~ Crafted from wood panelled with a rosy burnished copper, the body of this cylindrical case features a length-wise flap as the only opening. Lining the base of the interior are layers of thick white cotton, stopping just short of a latch securing the opening of a separate compartment large enough to hold a few cubes of ice. A circular plate etched with an oak leaf is affixed to one flat side alongside the fettered end of a dark leather belt loop.

Bodice ~ Narrow stays support panels of matte gold leather to ensure a tapering silhouette when the lacing is pulled taut through a spinal column of copper grommets. Radiating upwards and outwards from the basque waist, a blend of tawny and claret foil leaves cover the entire bodice in a blaze of autumnal color, their veins accented by gilt threadwork. Similar stitching frames the exposed decolletage, rising to a flared collar of grouse feathers, cradling the back of the head in rust red plumage.

Rohese has a near smothering veil of hardwood smoke about her, darkened by black musk and redeemed only slightly by a lucent ember of heliotrope burning in the background. From beneath the soot of the head notes rise strains of cassis and bitter-green inclusions of wormwood.

Hips
Thursday, August 17th, 2017, 6:16:09 PM

Gearing up for endless arena runs since DR beta testing starts tonight in Plat.

Heavy sparks dance around Issalya as wisps of electricity travel up and down her body.

You see Grand Lady Issalya Valdarien Illistim the Chosen of Gosaena.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is petite and has a slim body. She appears to have come of age. She has large, owlish gentian blue eyes and pale as parchment skin. She has long, lustrous silver hair that trails past her waist in a riot of gently coiled mercurial curls. She has a heart-shaped face and a pair of half-lensed spectacles perched upon her small nose. Her small, yet distinctively sloping nose is perfectly offset by the bowed curve of her upper lip, while her slender neck and delicate bone structure enhance her fragile appearance. She has crimson-sparked velvety black lacquer brushed onto her gently rounded fingernails.

She has a pair of white-feathered wings protruding from her back and extended to their full reach.

She is in good shape.

She is wearing an ephemeral circlet of flowing air weaves, an orb-inset fel talisman, a deeply hooded grey silk satin dolman, a gold-framed ivory gardenia crest, some hematite black dupioni robes washed with the faintest tint of scarlet, a slender silver signet, a black leather components satchel, and some slim over-the-knee ebon kidskin boots with tapering pointed toes.

You have the distinctive aroma of black tea clinging to your skin, enhanced by sweet, creamy vanilla top notes. Bitter accords of bergamot are undercut by the delicate musk of aged bookbinding and finished with an underlying sharp coppery tang.

Friday, August 18th, 2017, 6:31:49 AM

Sugar and Spice again today because who doesn't love CHOCOLATE!

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair held in a loose chignon by some twisted platinum hairsticks. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has a silky smooth caramel glaze brushed onto her neatly rounded fingernails.

She has an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck, and a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline.

She is in good shape.

She is holding an oiled cocoa leather case buffed to a high shine in her right hand. She is wearing a lengthy platinum lariat necklace split by a brilliant-cut dark chocolate diamond, a platinum wedding ring, a strapless chocolate velvet gown skirted with ruffled downswept wings of organza, and a pair of chocolate brown organza high-heeled sandals.

Rohese has the rich scent of fine milk chocolate wafting about her, encasing the milky sweetness of cream flavored with lavender. Base notes of almond and vanilla course throughout, giving the fragrance a decadent nose.

Saturday, August 19th, 2017, 5:15:32 AM

Metallic Mastery with a touch of fae madness today:

You see Chatelaine Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim.

She appears to be an Elf.

She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She appears to be youthful. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair arranged in an intricately twisted roll at the back of her head and held in place by some silver winged-fairy hairjewels. She has naturally glossy, rose-pink tinted lips. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has sparkling opalescent vaalin silver polish brushed onto her delicately rounded fingernails.

She has a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline, and an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck.

She is in good shape.

She is holding a vaalin-framed silver linden case in her right hand.

She is wearing a silk-strung pendant of foiled glass faerie wings, a dark silver full-finger ring, a platinum wedding ring, a pearlescent vaalin-hued silk gown dramatically plunging to an argent satin court train, and some pale silver chain mesh shoes inset with crystalline streams.

You see your ring. Tiny scales of polished silver and dull alum have been layered in a seemingly random pattern to form a full finger-length ring. The juxtaposition of shine and shadow reveals the semblance of a fairy, her wings appearing to flutter through a trick of clever metal-working as the surface is turned into the light.

Rohese has a wild melange of floral scents floating about her. The untameable scent of heather is accented by larkspur and breaths of fairy primrose.

Through an ethereal white haze, you see Issalya swathed in a shroud of ice-fringed dark moonlight. Her eyes are pools of swirling grey reminiscent of Lornon's surface. A sickly blood red hue occasionally washes across her pale as parchment skin, which is chiseled with mystical runes glowing with power.

I loooove this version of the cosmos rune, because this is a painting I did for her property:

a silver-framed nightscape painting: The stark black canvas is daubed with exceedingly short brushstrokes in silver and white to depict celestial bodies of the night sky. Centered are eleven brightly pigmented stars forming the constellation of The Gates, beyond which shimmers a dark, crimson-tinged moon veiled in swirls of grey. The likeness of Lornon seems to almost roil in the painting, the fluctuations hazing the orb reminiscent of ethereal feathers.

So much <3 for these new bloodrunes!

l choker (FWI transporter) You see your choker. Caught in a tangle of satin-sheen gold filaments are small, yellow jade cinquefoils. The five heart-shaped petals of each blossom surround a cluster of coppery stamens, drawing the eye into their very depths where tiny crystals seem to glisten like droplets of dew. Scattered throughout the floriated choker are a blend of varied green, orange, and red jade-carved leaves, adding hints of autumnal color to the piece.

l case Square in shape, this highly decorative case boasts a front panel of cedar marquetry lacquered for a mirror finish and accented with polished gold hinges and hasp. Intermittent tans of blonde tortoiseshell within the geometric design complement the lighter streaks inherent in the reddish-brown softwood, whilst a rigid framework of kakore slats line the interior to provide convenient compartments for all manner of small and large items.

Rohese has a gilded miasma of fragrance on her skin, with notes of pale golden musk, honeycomb, and amber foremost in attendance. Beneath run streams of parma violet and hawthorn bark, faintly sweet with a touch of bitter, over low-lying currents of white moss and wild berry.

With the prospect of heading into the shadow valance...

You remove an archaic elven-crafted helm from in an antique faenor chest.

Pristine interior padding and supple leather trim contrast sharply with the time-worn verdant imflass of this distinctly Ta'Faendryl helm. The once gleaming deep forest shades of evergreen and moss the helm still carries are now faded with age. A motif of lor leaves have been utilized to cover the helm as scales and are layered in an upswept winged manner from the brow to provide coverage for a pointed elven ear. A full face shield locks down into place, giving the helm a fierce dragon-like appearance. The helm is hinged to allow adjustability.

You take an elven-wrought eonake circlet skeletally caged with illthorn branches off your head.

wear helm You firmly seat your helm on your head. clos helm You pull down the faceplate of your helm. lock helm You lock down the helm's faceplate and ready for battle.

Today, Rohese will mostly be wearing ...

You see High Lady Rohese Bayvel-Timsh'l Illistim the Patron of the Displaced. She appears to be an Elf. She is taller than average with a slender willowy form. She has silver-lashed misty grey eyes and silky smooth, fair skin. She has lustrous, hip-length pale silver hair gathered into a loose top knot and skewered with a pair of pearl-tipped driftwood hairsticks. Peeking through her hair are dainty upswept ears tapering to fine points which enhance her fey-like countenance. She has pale-edged sea blue lacquer brushed onto her oval-shaped fingernails. Her face is concealed by an airy veil of pure white silk. She has an inking of a faint star constellation on her neck, and a cascade of tiny silver stars tattooed over her right eyebrow that fades into her hairline. She is in good shape. She is holding a foil parchment envelope in her right hand. She is wearing some gilt-wired cloisonne fish earrings, a silver-strung oval driftwood locket, a platinum wedding ring, a drop-shouldered surcote of luxuriously soft viridian paeline over a milky white silk cotehardie with ladder-laced pendant sleeves, and a pair of viridian oiled leather divit-toed shoes.

l earrings (FW transporter) You see your earrings. A length of thin gilded wire connects each small stud to a drop pendant earring. Whilst the head of the fish is static, with the bale attached to the tip of its nose, six segments of solid silver make up its slender body and are articulated to allow for subtle movement. Glossy celadon-hued enamel adds texture and interest to an already singular piece of craftsmanship, with accents of vibrant turquoise and pearlised creamy white inlay on the underside of the caudal fin.

l locket (normally hidden) Strung from a simple silver chain, the locket is fashioned of a rough piece of driftwood that has been fused to an ovoid of flatted silver. Clear lacquer allows the driftwood to be preserved and prevents any splintering or fracturing, while the image of a single trident has been burned into the wood. A small oval hasp on the door of the piece allows it to be secured in place as the need arises. (bonded and with a portrait of the hubs inside)

Rohese has the scent of sweet white jasmine, garden rose, and night-blooming columbine, floating elegantly in the air about her.
